Once upon a time, there was a 2 man named 2.2 worked as a 2 by day but...by night.. 2 was the amazing Mr.2!!!!!!
The amazing Mr.2 would save cats & 2's from trees.Using the power of the 2
 Mild mannered 2 would put on his 2 costumeTo help those in need for the low low fee of €2 because he is the amazing Mr. 2!!!!!!
